thread.title: Sky-high: Inside Dubai's MOST EXPENSIVE apartment... on sale for a whopping £32MILLION
thread.title_full: Sky-high: Inside Dubai's MOST EXPENSIVE apartment... on sale for a whopping £32MILLION

title: Sky-high: Inside Dubai's MOST EXPENSIVE apartment... on sale for a whopping £32MILLION
text:
Sky-high: Inside Dubai's MOST EXPENSIVE apartment... on sale for a whopping £32MILLION Sky-high: Inside Dubai's MOST EXPENSIVE apartment... on sale for a whopping £32MILLION DUBAI'S most expensive apartment has gone on sale for a whopping $49million (£32million) - but it won't be ready until 2017. PUBLISHED: 09:23, Tue, Sep 1, 2015 | UPDATED: 09:37, Tue, Sep 1, 2015 CATERS Dubais most expensive apartment called One on Palm Jumeirah 
Sitting on top of ONE at Palm Jumeirah - a 25 storey tower - the plush penthouse pad comes with an infinity pool and spa, as well as a 12-space garage. 
Described as a 'private temple' the lavish complex is due for completion by 2017 and being constructed by Omniyat and Drake & Scull International. 
The eight-bedroom suite, which sprawls across 42,477 square-feet, is decked with a staggering 16,641 square-feet of balcony area. CATERS/OnePalm The apartment won't be ready till 2017 CATERS/One Palm The eight-bedroom suite, which sprawls across 42,477 square-feet Caters/One Palm Sitting on top of ONE at Palm Jumeirah 
As well as a maid's quarter, a kitchen with a separate prep room and wall-to-wall windows, there is a professional barbeque pit and outdoor terrace. 
The entire building was designed by New York firm SOMA architects and boasts panoramic views of both the ocean and the flashy city. 
Other facilities include a gym, hair salon and a cinema. 
Previously an apartment in Dubai's Burj Khalifa building clinched the title as the city's most expensive property after selling for $16.3m (£10.62 million). One Palm/CATERS a 25 storey tower - the plush penthouse pad comes with an infinity pool and spa CATERS/OnePalm Described as a private temple the lavish complex is due for completion by 2017 CATERS/One Palm
